        textureImage - image of Powerup
        x - x-coordinate on window
        y - y-coordinate on window
        row - row number on window grid
        column - column number on window grid

      • checkOverlap

        public boolean checkOverlap(int newRow,
                            int newColumn,
                            Wizard wizard,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Tile> allTiles,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Gremlin> allGremlins,
                            Door exitDoor,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Door> portals)
        Checks if coordinates overlap with another object on map
        Parameters:
        newRow - row number on window to be checked
        newColumn - column number on window to be checked
        wizard - Wizard object on map
        allTiles - list containing all tiles on map
        allGremlins - list containing Gremlins on map
        exitDoor - exit door on map
        portals - list containing all portals on map
        Returns:
        true if coordinates overlap with another object on map
